runner.progress_summary_variant_format:
label("Mo") ~ display_as_time(mode(variant.time.avg), coalesce(subject.time_unit,"time"), subject.time_precision, subject.time_mode) ~ 
" (" ~ rstdev(variant.time.avg) ~ ")" ~ " [" ~ mode(variant.mem.final) as memory ~ " / " ~ mode(variant.mem.peak) as memory ~ "]"

html.title: All Your Benchmark Are Belong to Us

warm_cache.title: Warm cache
warm_cache.description: Warm in-memory or file cache - e.g. after the first time given class was reflected.

cold_cache.title: Cold cache
cold_cache.description: Cold cache - e.g. the first time reflecting a class.

cold_cache_plus_initialization.title: Cold cache + initialization
cold_cache_plus_initialization.description: Cold cache + library initialization - e.g. autoloading and the first time reflecting a class.
